content.html: I have a jobby: a job that happens to pay me to do my hobby. The upside is it makes work (a shitty concept, ask any other animals) bearable and sometimes fun! The downside is I really enjoy my hobby, which makes it harder to set boundaries with work.
content.value:
I have a jobby: a job that happens to pay me to do my hobby.

The upside is it makes work (a shitty concept, ask any other animals) bearable and sometimes fun! The downside is I really enjoy my hobby, which makes it harder to set boundaries with work.
